info.name: Daylight Mode Steam
info.description:
Steam Daylight Mode/Light Scheme/Inverted/Afterlife/Trial Version Theme
- Not suitable for people with sound vision.
- No official version is planned.
- If there are any alternatives, please let me know.
- The principle is invert(). The side effect is the full speed of the fan and significant lag. May cause some bugs (e.g. hover/fixed component misalignment).
- Support: steampowered/steamcommunity.com, steamdb.info, steamgames/steamchina/steamdeck.com, steamcharts.com
- Not supported: iframe element, CSS background image `background-image:url()`, "PATCH NOTES, EVENTS, ANNOUNCEMENTS".
+ Bug reports are welcome, but usually nothing can be done.

Steam 阴/日间版/亮/反/浅色版/试用版主题
- 不适合视力健全的人士。
- 没有计划出正式版。
- 如有雷同，欢迎告知。
- 原理是 invert()。副作用是风扇转速拉满和显著卡顿。可能会产生些 BUG（例如：悬浮/固定组件错位）。
- 支持：steampowered/steamcommunity.com, steamdb.info, steamgames/steamchina/steamdeck.com, steamcharts.com
- 不支持：iframe 元素、CSS背景图片 `background-image:url()`、“补丁说明、活动、公告”。
+ 欢迎反馈问题，但通常都无能为力。
info.additionalInfo:
CHANGELOG/更新日志
3.5.6 (220228)
- Support/支持 "steamdeck.com"
- Fix/修复 "/steamdeck", animated_featured_capsule_BGImage
- Experimental/实验性: Support dark background image hard code invert on more pages/支持特定页面上开启背景图片反色
+ --- https://store.steampowered.com/*sale/*

3.4.8 (220217)
- Fix background image invert for firefox/修复火狐模式下的背景图片反色

3.4.7 (220217)
- Support dark background image hard code invert on some pages (experimental)/支持部分页面上开启（特定区域的）背景图片反色（试验性）
+ --- https://store.steampowered.com/ (firefox only)
+ --- https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/*/sale/*
+ --- https://store.steampowered.com/developer/*/sale/*
- Fix animated_featured_capsule_BGImage of Specials/修复specials页面的动画背景反色
- Adjust description/调整描述简介

3.4.5 (220124)
- Support/支持 "steamcharts.com"
- Fix "steamdb.info" background color piroity for firefox/修复火狐模式下"steamdb.info"的背景颜色优先度

3.4.3 (220117)
- Fix Points Shop sticker preview/修复点数商店的贴图预览
- Fix blur portrait salepreviewwidgets background/修复竖屏游戏宣传封面的模糊背景的反色
- Adjust setting description/微调选项描述
- Fix default settings of "Install style as userscript"/修复“以脚本形式安装”时的错误默认选项
- Fix "partner.steamgames.com" logo/修复steam文献库的logo反色

3.3.9 (211223)
- Support/支持 "steamchina.com"
- Adjust body background/微调body元素背景样式
- Adjust winter sale #sale_tag_genre style/微调冬季特卖的类型主题走马灯样式

3.3.7 (211221)
- Replace setting "[[browser_specific]]" with "[[ff_flag]]" and "[[cr_flag]]"/替换更新了"浏览器兼容性"选项
- Fix/修复 "steamdb.info"/"partner.steamgames.com" bugs in firefox
+ BUG: not support "Install style as userscript"/不支持脚本形式安装

3.3.4 (211221)
- Support/支持 "steamdb.info", "partner.steamgames.com"
- Adjust style and setting description/微调样式及选项描述

3.1.3 (211206)
- Support/支持 "steamcommunity.com"
2.8.4 (211128)
